price: 你还不知道吗？我把恶魔们放出去诱惑不归信者，
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزّٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annā arsalnā al-shayāṭīna ʿalā al-kāfirīna ta-uzzuhum azzan
